name: twilights
title: Twilights
description: Table with twilights data infered from light data for all tags. Twilight data is typically computed with [`GeoPressureR::twilight_create()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/twilight_create.html).

fields.name: tag_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the tag. Foreign key to [`tags.tag_id`](/core/tags#tag_id).

fields.name: twilight
fields.description: Date and time of the twilights. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`.

fields.name: rise
fields.description: Boolean value to indicate if the twilight is a sunrise (true) or sunset (false).

fields.name: label
fields.description: Labeling of the twilight data according to the [GeoPressureManual](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureManual/light-map.html#manual-labelling-of-twilight). The value `discard` indicates that the twilight should not be used for geopositioning. Any other value can be use without affecting the workflow, typically set to `stap_id` allows to visualize which twilight belong to the same stationary period on trainset.
